title: Best Mcdonalds Rap
description: My buddy Micah and I went to the Mcdonald's near UT campus and he recorded while I rapped my order to drive-thru lady. It's not amazing but it was a lot of fun! If you like it show your friends!!!! UPDATE LYRICS AND INSTRUMENTAL The Instrumental is a remake of "Pass the dutch" from the album We are Young Money------Here is the link to the instrumental--------http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aSr31T... AND HERE THE LYRICS!!! I really want, a Cheesy McDouble But I'm Lactose intolerant- So cheese means trouble. My hungry stomach's empty--just like a bubble I wanna fill it with cheap food but not just rubble, Or Rubbish My tummy's rumblin' so I rub it I try so hard but I cannot rise above it I'm lovin' it, and I know that you love to see me smile I'm sorry I take so long, I know it's been a while I lay my order down just like flooring Tile So I reach to the console and count my change pile Nothing in my stomach but some acid and some bile If you can't hear my music let me turn up the dial (Turn music up here) I'm eyeing number two, maybe fries too But I'm a dollar menu dude, I'm not trying to be rude I don't wanna bite off more than I can chew.. I'm stingy, with my money like a Jew I meant AHH-Chu Don't bless me, No I didn't sneeze I'm just messing :) Can I have a large sweet tea please???
